plants.name: Kipli
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>一Bagaimana mungkin satu tanaman dapat tumbuh dan menghasilkan begitu banyak kacang polong dengan begitu cepat? Ucap Sang Kipli, "Kerja keras, komitmen, dan sarapan sehat dan seimbang yang mengandung sinar matahari dan karbon dioksida berserat tinggi membuat semuanya mungkin."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Sang Kipli adalah garis pertahanan pertama Anda. Mereka menembakkan kacang polong ke arah zombie yang menyerang.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20/1.5 Seconds</color></size>

plants.name: Windi
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Sunflower can't resist bouncing to the beat. Which beat is that? Why, the life-giving jazzy rhythm of the Earth itself, thumping at a frequency only Sunflower can hear.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Sunflowers are essential for you to produce extra sun. Try planting as many as you can!

<color=#3D1400>Sun Output: </color><color=red>25/25 Seconds</color></size>

plants.name: Bom ceri
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"I wanna explode," says Cherry #1. "No, let's detonate instead!" says his brother, Cherry #2. After intense consultation, they agree to explodonate.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Cherry Bombs can blow up all zombies in an area. They have a short fuse so plant them near zombies.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>1800 (Ashes)</color></size>

plants.name: Kacang Batu
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"People wonder how I feel about getting constantly chewed on by zombies," says Wall-nut. "What they don't realize is that with my limited senses, all I can feel is a kind of tingling, like a relaxing back rub."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Wall-nuts have hard shells which you can use to protect your other plants.

<color=#3D1400>Toughness: </color><color=red>4000</color></size>

plants.name: Ucup
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Some folks say Potato Mine is lazy, that he leaves everything to the last minute. Potato Mine says nothing. He's too busy thinking about his investment strategy.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Potato Mines pack a powerful punch, but they need a while to arm themselves. You should plant them ahead of zombies. They will explode on contact.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>1800</color></size>

plants.name: Dimas
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Chomper almost got a gig doing stunts for The Little Shop of Horrors but it fell through when his agent demanded too much on the front end. Chomper's not resentful, though. He says it's just part of the business.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Chompers can devour a zombie whole, but they are vulnerable while chewing.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red> Instant Kill</color></size>

plants.name: Puff-shroom
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"I only recently became aware of the existence of zombies," says Puff-shroom. "Like many fungi, I'd just assumed they were fairy tales or movie monsters. This whole experience has been a huge eye-opener for me."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Puff-shrooms are cheap, but can only fire a short distance.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Can stack up to three times.</color></size>

plants.name: Fume-shroom
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"I was in a dead-end job producing yeast spores for a bakery," says Fume-shroom. "Then Puff-shroom, bless 'im, told me about this great opportunity blasting zombies. Now I really feel like I'm making a difference."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Fume-shrooms shoot fumes that can pass through screen doors.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Can pierce through.</color></size>

plants.name: Hypno-shroom
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"Zombies are our friends," asserts Hypno-shroom. "They're badly misunderstood creatures who play a valuable role in our ecology. We can and should do more to bring them round to our way of thinking."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>When eaten, Hypno-shrooms will make a zombie turn around and fight for you.

<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Makes a single zombie fight for you.</color></size>

plants.name: Scaredy-shroom
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"Who's there?" whispers Scaredy-shroom, voice barely audible. "Go away. I don't want to see anybody. Unless it's the man from the circus."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Scaredy-shrooms are long-ranged shooters that hide when enemies get near them.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20/1.5 Seconds</color></size>

plants.name: Ice-shroom
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Ice-shroom frowns, not because he's unhappy or because he disapproves, but because of a childhood injury that left his facial nerves paralyzed.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Ice-shrooms temporarily immobilize all zombies on the screen.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Freezes all zombies in place.</color></size>

plants.name: Bom Hiroshima
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"You're lucky I'm on your side," says Doom-shroom. "I could destroy everything you hold dear. It wouldn't be hard."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Doom-shrooms destroy everything in a large area and leave a crater that can't be planted on.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>1800 (Ashes)</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Leaves a crater.</color></size>

plants.name: Daun
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Lily Pad never complains. Lily Pad never wants to know what's going on. Put a plant on top of Lily Pad, he won't say a thing. Does he have startling opinions or shocking secrets? Nobody knows. Lily Pad keeps it all inside.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Lily Pads let you plant non-aquatic plants on top of them.

<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Non-aquatic plants can be planted on it. Changes appearance, but provides no additional attributes.</color></size>

plants.name: The Rock
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"I'm ready!" yells Squash. "Let's do it! Put me in! There's nobody better! I'm your guy! C'mon! Whaddya waiting for? I need this!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Squashes will smash the first zombie that gets close to it.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>1800</color></size>

plants.name: Threepeater
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Threepeater likes reading, backgammon, and long periods of immobility in the park. Threepeater enjoys going to shows, particularly modern jazz. "I'm just looking for that special someone," he says. Threepeater's favorite number is 5.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Threepeaters shoot peas in three lanes.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20*3/1.5 Seconds</color></size>

plants.name: Tangle Kelp
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"I'm totally invisible," Tangle Kelp thinks to himself. "I'll hide here just below the surface, and nobody will see me." His friends tell him they can see him perfectly well, but he'll never change.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Tangle Kelp are aquatic plants that pull the first zombie that nears them underwater.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red> Instant Kill</color></size>

plants.name: Jalapeno
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"NNNNNGGGGG...." Jalapeno says. He's not going to explode, not this time. But soon. Oh, so soon. It's close. He knows it; he can feel it; his whole life's been leading up to this moment.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Jalapenos destroy an entire row of zombies.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>1800 (Ashes)</color></size>

plants.name: Spikeweed
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Hockey is Spikeweed's obsession. He's got box seat season tickets. He keeps close track of his favorite players. And he consistently cleans up in the office hockey pool. Just one problem: he's terrified of pucks.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Spikeweeds pop tires and hurt any zombies that step on them

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20/1 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Instakill Vehicle Zombies</color></size>

plants.name: Torchwood
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Everybody likes and respects Torchwood. They like him for his integrity, for his steadfast friendship, for his ability to greatly maximize pea damage. But Torchwood has a secret: He can't read.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Torchwoods turn peas that pass through them into fireballs that deal twice as much damage.

<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Ignites peas that pass through it, increasing their damage.</color></size>

plants.name: Sea-shroom
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Sea-shroom has never seen the sea. It's in his name, he's heard loads about it, but he's just never found the time. One day, though, it'll go down.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Sea-shrooms are aquatic plants that shoot short ranged spores.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20/1.5 Seconds</color></size>

plants.name: Plantern
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Plantern defies science. He just does. Other plants eat light and excrete oxygen; Plantern eats darkness and excretes light. Plantern's cagey about how he does it. "I'm not gonna say 'sorcery,' I wouldn't use the term 'dark forces,' I just... I think I've said enough."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Planterns light up an area to let you see through fog, and give light levels to plants.

<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Dispels the fog with light.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Lumos System: </color><color=red>Provides 1 Lumos Level in a 3x3 Grid, which can be stacked to provide strength to other light plants. Refer to its fusions for the list of affected plants.</color></size>

plants.name: Reza
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>She's prickly, sure, but Cactus' spikes belie a spongy heart filled with love and goodwill. She just wants to hug and be hugged. Most folks can't hang with that, but Cactus doesn't mind. She's been seeing an armadillo for a while and it really seems to be working out.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Cactuses shoot spikes that can hit both ground and air targets.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Can attack flying zombies.</color></size>

plants.name: Blover
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>When Blover was five he got a shiny new birthday cake. Blover made his wish, huffed and puffed, but was able to extinguish only 60% of the candles. Instead of giving up, though, he's used that early defeat as a catalyst to push himself harder ever since.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Blovers blow away all balloon zombies and fog, except Bucket-copter Zombies and Zomppelins.

<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Blows away fog and Balloon Zombies. Pushes back Zomppelins slightly.</color></size>

plants.name: Bintang
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"Aw, man," says Starfruit. "I went to the dentist the other day, and he said that I have four cavities. I've got—count it—ONE tooth! Four cavities in one tooth? How does this happen?"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Starfruits shoot stars in 5 directions.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20*5/1.5 Seconds</color></size>

plants.name: Pumpkin
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Pumpkin had just wrapped up his part-time gig. "Honestly, it was a pretty fun experience," he chuckled. "But can someone explain why they kept stuffing candy and candles inside me?"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Pumpkins protect plants that are within their shells.

<color=#3D1400>Toughness: </color><color=red>4000</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Priority: </color><color=red>Lowest</color></size>

plants.name: Jamur Magnet
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Everyone wondered why Magnet-shroom always took so long to "digest" the iron he absorbed, even after it had already been taken away for fusion. Frustrated, he snapped, "I'm not lazy! I just got knocked out by flying iron!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Magnet-shrooms can absorb metallic objects.

<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Can attract metal objects.</color>
If there is a magnetic plant in the 8-direction vicinity of another magnetic plant, they are then connected through the Magnetic System. The Magnetic System has no limit to its number of connections, and will boost the strength of some magnetic plants based on its amount. Refer to its fusions for the list of affected plants.</size>

plants.name: <size=24>Swordmaster Starfruit</size>
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"I have fought across 3,000 miles of battlefield, my blade halting millions in their tracks." The Swordmaster Starfruit, a lover of fine drinks and poetry, takes great pride in his impeccable cosplay skills. With a sly smile, he adds, "My sword never bleeds, for it is merely a decoration."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>A guest from afar, I think you will want to become friends.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>200*5+30*20/6 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Each attack unleashes 5 swords that pierce infinitely, dealing 200 damage each. Additionally, it inflicts 600 damage to all zombies within the surrounding grid, repeating this 20 times.</color></size>

plants.name: <size=30>Kotak Gacha Zombie
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Introducing the Zombie Giftbox—the zombies' entry point into the world of finance. As a high-risk financial product, it comes equipped with a reminder: "Investing carries inherent risks; proceed with caution. Sponsored by Dr. Yan Wang." This vital information is cleverly tucked inside the box lid.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Earn 100 Sun, but spawns a Gold-box Zombie.

<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Spawns a Gold-box Zombie.</color></size>

plants.name: WHAT IS THIS 3
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>阳光父子坚果说付我500阳光，让我帮他个忙，所以我来了。能难到哪里去呢？总不可能是冲进僵尸堆里吧？</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>碾压僵尸。

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>1800</color></size>

plants.name: Cattail Girl
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"Cats are usually afraid of water, but I'm a magical cat girl, so I'm not afraid." she said enthusiastically, and the other cats looked at her with admiration. Actually, she absolutely loves water, and she said this to make herself stand out.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>The Cattail Girl will automatically attack all zombies that appear on the map.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>40*2/1.5 Seconds</color></size>

plants.name: Padi
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Barley calls itself a generalist, but other plants think of it as just a bit player — "After all, other plants always do the work, don't they?"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Barley can transform into any basic, fused, or ultimate plant.

<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Transforms into a random plant every 30 seconds.</color></size>

plants.name: Endoflame
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>It is said that small flowers like her would never dream of producing Sun — the Endoflame was originally going to apply for the position of Sunflower, but she realized that her light would only shine when she is being destroyed. Everyone says that the flame at the top of her head is the brightest, but she knows that her fiery eyes of determination is the source of her strength.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>The Endoflame can absorb bullets and produce Sun.

<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Each bullet can reduce toughness by 50 and produce 25 Sun. Produces a Fertilizer upon death.</color></size>

plants.name: Kentang Gelinding
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"I am invincible on the battlefield, and my partners can't take their eyes off my majestic figure!" the Giant Wall-nut boasted. "One year after getting kicked out of the Wall-nut Tumbler Club, I finally found a job that truly suits me."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Giant Wall-nut will roll forward and knock down any zombies it encounters.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>1800</color></size>

plants.name: Kotak Gacha
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>No one quite understands why the Plant Giftbox fights alongside the plants against the zombies. He doesn't look like a plant at all, yet he seems to know every plant's abilities inside and out. "Actually, I'm just a college student who loves video games," he admits with a grin. "The professor mentioned extra credit, so here I am."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>The Plant Giftbox can be planted to produce random plants or fusions.

<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>When placed on soil or on a Lily Pad, produces a random plant. Placing it on top of an eligible plant can produce a random fusion.</color></size>

plants.name: Empress-shroom
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Empress-shroom holds great affection for her zombie subordinates. "They contributed significantly to my rise as an Empress," she expressed. Unfortunately, these powerful zombies instill fear in other plants, something Empress-shroom is completely unaware of.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Summons zombies that will fight for you

<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Randomly selects 1 of the following zombies to summon:
Rugby-nut Zombie | Cherryshooter Newspaper Zombie | Zomboni | Scholar Zombie</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula:
</color><color=red>Hypno-shroom + Hypno-shroom</color></size>

plants.name: <size=20>Kipli Tentara Kerasukan Ceri Bom
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"I'm not sure why the Gatling Pea has so many fans. My brother and I can fire four bullets too," Gatling Cherrybomber remarked enviously. However, the truth is that everyone appreciates Gatling Pea for his kindness and outstanding culinary talents.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Gatling Cherrybomber is the strongest damage-dealer on land.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>300*4/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula:
</color><color=red>Gatling Cherry + Explodoshooter</color></size>

plants.name: <size=32>Squash Infernowood
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Squash Infernowood has a high opinion of himself, but other plants regard him with disdain, particularly those in the pea family. "He's too picky! He possesses such strong power, yet it only benefits cherries," they say. This infuriates Squash Infernowood. "I'm just allergic to peas…"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Spawns a Spicy Squash for every 20 cherries that pass through.

<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Cherry bomb bullets that pass through it become bouncing spicy squashes that explode after every bounce. After 20 of such bullets have passed, spawn a Spicy Squash in front.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Pyrewood + Spicy Squash</color></size>

plants.name: Cherrizilla
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Cherrizilla proudly says, "Many envy my dinosaur-like hairstyle." As a public figure, he's mindful of his image: "Spitting cherries and eating zombies is gross, but it's my duty."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Cherrizilla is the ultimate defensive plant on land.

<color=#3D1400>Toughness: </color><color=red>8000</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Chomping zombies restores 1000 Toughness, deal a 1000 damage, and spits out exploding cherries. Zombies with HP < 2000 will be insta-killed and restore full Toughness to Cherrizilla. Repels vehicles back, receiving at most 1/3 of its maximum Toughness.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Chewzilla + Cherry Chomper</color></size>

plants.name: Emperor-shroom
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Would Death employ a fashion consultant? King-shroom had no idea, but after noticing that he couldn't consistently frighten zombies, he turned to Hypno-shroom for a custom set of fashion designs. Although people might not favor Death, how would they react if he wore sparkling purple ice wings?</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Emperor-shroom deals immense damage, simultaneously charming and slowing down zombies.

<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Has a chance to charm zombies with HP < 50%, creating an explosion in the grid where the charmed zombie is located with a 500 damage.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula:
</color><color=red>Doomberg-shroom + Charm-shroom</color></size>

plants.name: Sun Emperor
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Sun Emperor, a master of photosynthesis, revolutionized light energy-mass conversion, minimizing energy loss through recycling. He humbly credits pioneers like Sunflower, Sun-shroom, and Endoflame: "I'm just standing on the shoulders of giants."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Sun Emperor produces Sun every time it is injured.

<color=#3D1400>Toughness: </color><color=red>4000</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Regardless of the type of damage dealt, each attack on it will only reduce 50 Toughness. Produces 15 Sun after every hit. Clicking the mouse on it will consume 500 Sun and cause a Giant-nut to come rolling down, also restoring Toughness to full in the process.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula:
</color><color=red>(Sunflower + Wall-nut) + Wall-nut</color></size>

plants.name: Spikesidian
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>After being baptized by fire and ice, Spikesidian became as hard as steel, but its temperament also became erratic. This change is likely due to the steel that condensed in its mouth, making it reluctant to speak.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Spikesidian can deal immense damage while also tanking multiple tires.

<color=#3D1400>Toughness: </color><color=red>6000</color>
<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>100*2/1 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Spikecicle + Spikinferno</color></size>

plants.name: Gatling Doom
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"Gatling Doom is dangerous and should not be approached. It is a forbidden force in the world." Despite the frightening tales circulating among the plants, Gatling Doom is not as it seems. In fact, it is one of the friendliest plants. However, the zombies turned to ashes would disagree.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Destruction incarnate. Fires rounds of destruction unlucky enough to face its wrath.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>300*4/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Fires a bullet of doom that deals 1800 damage once every 4 round of bullets. Each bullet will splash damage over a large area.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Gatling Pea + Doom-shroom</color></size>

plants.name: <size=30>Gatling Icicle-shroom
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>The little puff-shrooms who once shouted, "We are going to join the army!" have matured into veterans with resolute eyes. Wherever and whenever, the Gatling Icicle-shroom Company is committed to ensuring that the mission is accomplished.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Can be stacked three times to shoot 12 icicles at once!

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20*4*3/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Cryo System: </color><color=red>Each hit adds 5 Cryo Points. Bullets deal 4 times more damage to frozen enemies. Each bullet can pierce 3 times.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula:
</color><color=red>Puff-shroom + Gatling Snow (In Order)</color></size>

plants.name: Star Emperor
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>No one knows where Star Emperor is from, but one thing's for sure: He was not responsible for the dinosaurs. Not at all!</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Why the heck is there a meteor on my lawn!?

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20*5/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Lumos System: </color><color=red>Each Lumos level will increase the damage of the bullets by 20.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Magnetic System: </color><color=red>Each plant connected to the Magnetic System will increase the damage of the bullets by 5%.
<color=purple>Both systems can increase the damage of the bullets by upto 120, maximum.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Summons a meteor every 20 seconds, dealing 1800 damage upon impact. Splits into multiple bullets that home in on zombies and deal 100 damage each.</color></color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Starlure + Magcactus</color></size>

plants.name: Ultima-shroom
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"Nuclear deterrence is beneficial. Someday, the zombies will stop their assaults out of fear of my formidable self-detonation," Ultima-shroom asserted with confidence. Yet, it was evident that Ultima-shroom failed to understand that zombies wouldn't initiate a Cold War just because they were hit with cold air.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Sprays deadly fumes all around, bringing ultimate destruction. Beware!

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>(100+100*8)*4/1.9 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Damage Range: </color><color=red>5*5</color>
<color=#3D1400>Search Range：</color><color=red>5*3</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula:
</color><color=red>Doomberg-shroom + Cryogloom-shroom</color></size>

plants.name: Laser Pumpkin
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"The strength of Magnet-shroom remains excessive. After all, composite armor, electromagnetic catapults, and plasma machine guns are innovations that were developed nearly a century after aircraft carriers were first introduced," said Laser Pumpkin. Other plants envied the sci-fi gear of Laser Pumpkin, but only Magnet-shroom knew that he had simply been hit by a meteorite from the Star Emperor.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Spawns laser drones that home in on enemies.

<color=#3D1400>Toughness: </color><color=red>8000</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Always has a Laser Drone wingman with him when he appears. Generates a Laser Drone on top of a 3x3 grid regularly.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula:
</color><color=red>Bloverthorn Pumpkin + Magblover</color></size>

plants.name: WHERE IS THIS
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>感谢究极杨桃，现在我们有一整套新装备了！看看这些新奇玩意，复合装甲，电磁高速螺旋桨，还有等离子机炮......等等！不！我最喜欢的花瓶！</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>激光无人机可以发射激光穿透攻击。

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>200/1.5 Seconds（作为植物）200/1 Seconds(作为僚机)</color></size>

plants.name: Obsidian-nut
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Rather than seeking protection from his best friend, this plant would rather be the one to protect him. His hard, gem-like, and luminous body, along with his unwavering eyes, are formed by the Obsidian-nut's soul after enduring the trials of ice and fire etched into his very bones. Even if his body and mind become worn down one day, he is committed to doing whatever it takes to keep other plants safe.</color></size></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>The Obsidian-nut has four times the defense of a normal Tall-Nut.

<color=#3D1400>Toughness: </color><color=red>32000</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>1500 HP every 15 seconds. Resists being run over by a car, taking a maximum of 200 damage each time.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Frost-nut + Scorch-nut</color></size>

plants.name: Windi x Kipli
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"Actually, the Sunflower behind me is my sister," Pea Sunflower explained to everyone. "We've been inseparable since birth. She loves producing Sun, and I destroy zombies on her behalf." But everyone knows the truth: the cheerful Pea brother is a total siscon. After all, every zombie that gets near his sister mysteriously ends up vaporized by sunlight.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Pea Sunflower can fire Sun Bullets which produce Sun.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>100/5 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color>
<color=red>Bullets drop 5 Sun when hitting zombies.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Peashooter + Sunflower</color></size>

plants.name: Kipli Rasa Ceri
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"Red-hot anger issues? Me? Bah! You're red and hot! Your whole family is red!" Cherry Shooter despised being teased about the color of his head. But the jokes didn't last long—after eating special cherries, Pea Shooter really did turn red and warm, and yes, he could shoot cherry bullets.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Cherryshooter fires powerful cherry bullets.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>60/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Peashooter + Cherry Bomb</color></size>

plants.name: Windi Lato Lato
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"So… it's obvious… we are Pretty Cure, aren't we?" The two Sunflower sisters tried to suppress their excitement. "The world needs us to save it!" Their passion bubbled over as they shouted together, "Light! Illuminate this land!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Sun Bomb can produce Sun after killing zombies.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>1800 (Ashes)</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Produces 25 Sun for each zombie killed in the explosion.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Sunflower + Cherry Bomb</color></size>

plants.name: Bom Kentang
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"I heard some zombies grumbling about their inability to eat cherries. Well, here I am!" The cheerful Cherry Nut shook the leaves atop his head, boasting about his pure cherry flavor. "But first, you have to promise me something: when you have cherries, share a bit with me. In fact, just give me everything you've got! I was born for this!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Cherry-nut can absorb explosion damage and restore toughness.

<color=#3D1400>Toughness: </color><color=red>4000</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Absorbs Cherry explosion damage to restore toughness. (From Ally: 25, From Enemy: 200)</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Cherry Bomb + Wall-nut</color></size>

plants.name: Kentang Penyefong
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"No... don't call me ugly, or else... wait... I'll spray you." Pea-nut has always struggled with his "unique" appearance. But he firmly believes that what's inside a plant matters more than how it looks. Seeking guidance, he humbly asked senior Bowling Nut for advice and eventually mastered the technique of rolling nuts like bowling balls.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Pea-nut fire mini-nut bullets that can penetrate zombies.

<color=#3D1400>Toughness: </color><color=red>4000</color>
<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20/1.5 Seconds（Piercing）</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Peashooter + Wall-nut</color></size>

plants.name: <size=28>Kipli Kerasukan Bom Ceri
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Meet Explodoshooter, the ultimate plant killer. He's more irritable than ever—who would've thought the warm and friendly Cherryshooter would swallow another special cherry? Don't push your luck with him. That cherry stuck in his throat might just be his next shot—his face is already turning red!</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>The bullets fired by Explodoshooter will cause area explosion damage.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>300/3 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Peashooter + Cherry Bomb +
Cherry Bomb</color></size>

plants.name: <size=30>Kentang Bersedekah
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Solar-nut always sees himself as an angel, blissfully unaware that the other plants often talk behind his back. "If he adds a few black lines, he will look exactly like a bee."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Solar-nut produce Sun while protecting your plants.

<color=#3D1400>Toughness: </color><color=red>4000</color>
<color=#3D1400>Sun Output: </color><color=red>25/15 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Sunflower + Wall-nut</color></size>

plants.name: Ucup Kipli
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Pea Mine may not have eyes, but he has his own special way of sensing zombies. "I feel it…" he murmured, "The zombies are getting closer… closer… closer…" Pea Mine's heartbeat quickened, and so did his firing speed. Faster, faster… until, with a "bang," Pea Mine exploded into a burst of potato-flavored fireworks.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Pea Mine can attack before unearthing.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Upon exploding, releases 36 bullets on all directions.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Peashooter + Potato Mine</color></size>

plants.name: Kipli 2 Rasa Ceri
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Cherrypeater lives by the motto "good things come in pairs." Whether it's fighting zombies or handing out presents, he does it all in twos. "But come on," Repeater teased, "those cherries of yours aren't even close to ripe."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Cherrypeater can fire two cherries at a time.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>60*2/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Repeater + Cherry Bomb</color></size>

plants.name: Windi Ranjau
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"Stop at red lights, slow down at yellow lights, and obey traffic rules!" Sun Mine frequently warns zombies. But to the zombies, all they see is the disgusting green hue before them. He clutches green leaves and pouts, wishing for more sunshine. "After all, sunshine is what fuels us all!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Sun Mine produces Sun until and after its explosion.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>1800</color>
<color=#3D1400>Sun Output: </color><color=red>25/15 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Sunflower + Potato Mine</color></size>

plants.name: Kacang Ranjau
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Once seen as small and weak, Mine-nut now stood tall and strong, boasting a pair of big eyes and firm flesh. Yet beneath that sturdy exterior, he felt fragile and feared shrinking back to his former size. The zombies quipped, "If you take another bite, you'll explode!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Mine-nut can explode while being eaten and once when broken.

<color=#3D1400>Toughness: </color><color=red>4000</color>
<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>500 / Explosion, 1800 / Death</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Wall-nut + Potato Mine</color></size>

plants.name: Dimas Congor
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Chomper has always envied Chomp-shooter's ability to spit out zombie remains, and he's tried to learn the trick more than once. Little did he know, though, that the secret wasn't a special skill—it was just that Chomp-shooter's mouth was slightly deformed, causing bits of zombie to leak out while chewing.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Chomp-shooter can fire bullets after biting.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red> Instant Kill</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Spits out piercing bullets after biting that deals 80 damage.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Peashooter + Chomper</color></size>

plants.name: Dimas Mau Makan
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>As a young plant, Chomp-nut was notoriously picky about food, never swallowing zombies in one bite, which frustrated its parents. After much persuasion, Chomp-nut finally learned to consume zombies whole, just like its predecessors. "I'm not picky! I just want to imitate how zombies eat. I should try something new, right? It's definitely not because I don't have a neck, making it inconvenient to swallow in one bite," Chomp-nut said while chewing on a zombie.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Chomp-nut can restore toughness after eating zombies.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red> Instant Kill</color>
<color=#3D1400>Toughness: </color><color=red>4000</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Wall-nut + Chomper</color></size>

plants.name: Chewzilla
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Chewzilla savors every meal, despite his smaller mouth. "Big mouths are sloppy and don't hit the gym; they fall apart on the front line," he scoffs. "I only eat the essence of zombie meat and spit out the rest," he grins, though his backyard is filling up with leftovers.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Chewzilla can both be a bulwark and fierce attacker.

<color=#3D1400>Toughness: </color><color=red>4000</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Eating zombies restores 100 Toughness and deals 200 Damage while spitting out rolling bullets that inflict 80 Damage and pierce infinitely. Zombies with HP < 500 and no armor are instantly killed, restoring 200 Toughness and spawning bullets that deal 20 Damage, pierce 5 times, and knock back zombies.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Peashooter + Wall-nut + Chomper</color></size>

plants.name: Dimas Punk
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Everyone was curious about how Sun Chomper transformed the zombies it devoured into sunlight, but it always hesitated to share its secret. One day, Sunflower discovered that her chlorophyll content had significantly diminished, revealing the truth: it wasn't actually turning zombies into sunlight.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Sun Chomper can produce Sun after swallowing zombies.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red> Instant Kill</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color>
<color=red>Produces 100 Sun after swallowing zombies.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Sunflower + Chomper</color></size>

plants.name: Dimas Ranjau
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Delicious and enticing, Potato Mines taste just like self-heating mashed potatoes, earning rave reviews from zombies. Among them, fries take the top spot in popularity. As zombies flock to the tantalizing aroma of French fries, they have no idea they're also indulging in tasty potato chips. "Just wait and see," Chomp-mine said with a mouthful, "Their nutrients will soon become new mines."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>After swallowing a zombie, the Chomp-mine will grow Potato Mines in front of it.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red> Instant Kill</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Plants a Potato Mine in front of it upon swallowing a zombie.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Potato Mine + Chomper</color></size>

plants.name: Dimas GYAT!
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Ever since her drink with Cherry Bomb, Chomper has been constantly "buzzing." "Try this!" became her new mantra before every meal. The sound of chewing transformed into explosive pops as plates and bowls flew everywhere, leaving everyone unwilling to dine with her. After a show of hands, Cherry Chomper ended up eating in the yard. Now, she finds entertainment on zombies, shouting "Try this!"—at least she no longer has to buy new tableware.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Explodes a Cherry Bomb upon eating a zombie.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red> Instant Kill</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Creates a Cherry explosion in front when biting, killing zombies in a 3x3 grid.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Cherry Bomb + Chomper</color></size>

plants.name: <size=30>Kipli Tentara Rasa Ceri
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Gatling Cherry's barrel was always red hot. He assured everyone that it was preheated to ensure faster bullet firing. Everyone bought the story—until they caught him eating special cherries without even removing the barrel.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Cherryshooter's final form!

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>60*4/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Gatling Pea + Cherry Bomb</color></size>

plants.name: Kipli-Kecil
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"Don't let my size fool you; even a small body can contain a lot of energy," Pea-shroom cautions those who underestimate him. "We all began as tiny mushrooms, making progress a little at a time. With dedication to a sunny breakfast, you can become just like me."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Pea-shroom shoot further than Puff-shroom.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color>
<color=red>Puff-shroom + Peashooter (In Order)</color></size>

plants.name: Repea-shroom
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"Who am I? The double-shot holds the answer!" exclaims the little puff-shroom, proudly flaunting the twin leaves atop its head. With double bullets and double the cheer, these spirited beings thrive in groups, eagerly pouring their firepower onto the battlefield, showcasing that size doesn't define their strength.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Repea-shroom can fire two small peas at a time.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20*2/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Puff-shroom + Repeater (In Order)</color></size>

plants.name: Buckshooter
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"I embody the spirit of my ancestors; I will not fall here!" Ironshooter asserted confidently to anyone who crossed his path. When it was pointed out that his helmet resembled one stolen from the Iron Bucket Zombie, he countered, "Then let us invoke their will and ride the winds and waves once more!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Ironshooter has the ability to crack armor.

<color=#3D1400>Toughness: </color><color=red>2000</color>
<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>80/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Knocks back on contact. Deals immense damage to Iron Zombies, and break iron doors.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Peashooter + Iron</color></size>

plants.name: Kanjud
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Nut or mushroom? Why worry about labels? Nut-shroom isn't about to tell you it's actually a matsutake in disguise anyway.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Nut-shroom can be your stalwart defender despite its size.

<color=#3D1400>Toughness: </color><color=red>2000</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color>
<color=red>Puff-shroom + Wall-nut (In Order)</color></size>

plants.name: Mini Hypno-shroom
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"As a kid, I believed zombies were nothing more than fairy tale monsters," Mini Hypno-shroom said softly. "Now, don't get it twisted—I'm just restoring them to the fairy tale form they were always supposed to have."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Shrinks a zombie and makes it fight for you!

<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Makes a zombie smaller (cuts Health in half) and fight for you.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color>
<color=red>Puff-shroom + Hypno-shroom (In Order)</color></size>

plants.name: <size=30>Hypno Fume-shroom</size>
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>The colorful Hypno Fume-shroom makes a grand debut! With a blast of spores, it can turn zombies around in an instant. Some claim it's a secret technique passed down by the mushroom family, while others believe it's a cutting-edge military weapon. Hypno Fume-shroom just smiles and says, "It's all thanks to Hypno-shroom helping me rinse my mouth every day."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Hypno Fume-shroom spray fumes that can charm zombies.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20/1.5 Seconds (Piercing) </color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>
Chance to charm zombies with <50% Health.
Hypnotizes the zombie that eats it.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>
Fume-shroom + Hypno-shroom</color></size>

plants.name: <size=28>Hypno Scaredy-shroom
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Scaredy-shroom has always been afraid of zombies. In order to reduce her fear, Hypno-shroom tells her a bedtime story every day: "Actually, there are good people among zombies." Over time, Scaredy-shroom was finally brainwashed. Now she can use spores to brainwash zombies. Of course, she is still very afraid.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Hypno Scaredy-shroom can fire bullets in 7 colors.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Randomly fires 1 of 7 types of bullets. When a zombie is hit by all 7 types of bullets, it will be charmed. Each time it is hit by a type of bullet, the charm probability of the Hypno Scaredy-shroom will increase.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color>
<color=red>Hypno-shroom + Scaredy-shroom</color></size>

plants.name: Bold-shroom
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"Courage fills me, no fear remains~ Whether it's spring, fall, winter, or summer~" Bold-shroom no longer shrinks in the face of zombies. "I used to tremble, but Senior Fume-shroom told me, 'If a zombie gets near, spray your spores. Hiding won't solve anything.'"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Bold-shroom is ready to take on the zombies, near or far!

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20*2/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>When zombies get close by 3 tiles, they will spray piercing fumes instead.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color>
<color=red>Fume-shroom + Scaredy-shroom</color></size>

plants.name: Charm-shroom
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Charm-shroom speaks with a soft smile, "Each spore carries my love, and when they bloom, it's like a spring breeze caressing the air." She even twisted her head into a heart to express her feelings. Her eyes shine with sincerity, hoping that maybe, just maybe, the zombies will understand her love.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Charm-shroom can fire explosive Charm spores.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>80 / 1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>40 splash damage in a 1x1.5 grid. Has a chance to charm zombies with < 50% HP.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Fume-shroom + Scaredy-shroom + Hypno-shroom</color></size>

plants.name: Abang Kentang
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"The taller you are, the more powerful you become." Tall-nut firmly believed in this, which is why he always stayed on the front line. Other plants would urge him to take it easy, but he'd just smile and say, "It's fine, I'm tall. As long as you fight quickly, the zombies won't have time to eat all of me."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Tall-nuts are heavy-duty wall plants that can't be vaulted or jumped over.

<color=#3D1400>Toughness: </color><color=red>8000</color></size>

plants.name: Rugby-nut
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Rugby-nut looked fierce, causing some small plants that didn't know the truth to feel scared by his appearance. However, the plants that understood Rugby-nut knew that beneath his serious exterior lay a strong determination to protect his companions. The stolen helmet undoubtedly boosted his confidence.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Rugby-nut is able to hold a huge amount of damage.

<color=#3D1400>Toughness: </color><color=red>16000</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Tall-nut + Rugby Helmet</color></size>

plants.name: Buck-nut
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Plants hold conflicting feelings about Buck-nut. As an exemplary soldier, he executes orders with unwavering precision, yet his cold demeanor leaves much to be desired. The rust at the corners of his mouth hints at a storied past. In the quiet moments, however, Buck-nut wrestles with an unspoken worry: "How do I prevent rust in a humid garden?"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Blocks the zombies' advance with a wall of iron.

<color=#3D1400>Toughness: </color><color=red>8000</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Wall-nut + Iron</color></size>

plants.name: Kipli Dua
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Unlike his bright and cheerful brother, Repeater leads a carefree life—until it's time to fight. He secretly mastered the art of double shooting but kept it hidden from Peashooter. "I just want him to live happily, without ever needing to learn these battle skills."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Repeater fires two peas at a time.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20*2/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Peashooter + Peashooter</color></size>

plants.name: Anak Windi
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Sun-shroom hates sun. He hates it so much that when it builds up in his system, he spits it out as fast as he can. He just won't abide it. To him, sun is crass.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Sun-shrooms give small sun at first and normal sun later.

<color=#3D1400>Sun Output: </color><color=red>15（25）/ 25 Seconds
<color=#3D1400>Growth Time: </color><color=red>120 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Puff-shroom + Sunflower</color></size>

plants.name: Kipli Tentara
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Gatling Pea, the big brother of the Pea family, stands tall with his gun barrel, the very foundation of everyone's safety. His back is like a monument on the battlefield, admired by all. Yet, he smiles modestly, knowing that his daily life is actually managed by his younger brother, Peashooter. "I can't live without him," he admits quietly.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Gatling Pea shoots four peas at a time.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20*4/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Split Pea + Peashooter</color></size>

plants.name: Windi Berkepala 2
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>The Twin Sunflower are known as sisters, always working behind the scenes rather than on the battlefield's front lines. Their role is to support everyone from the rear, but make no mistake—you must protect them. If they're harmed, many plants will quietly shed tears.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Twin Sunflowers give twice as much sun as a normal sunflower.

<color=#3D1400>Sun Output: </color><color=red>25*2/20 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Sunflower + Sunflower</color></size>

plants.name: Kipli Es
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>The cold-blooded Snow Pea rarely displays his emotions to other plants. Some say his heart is even colder than the frozen peas he fires. Snow Pea doesn't want to come off that way, but every time he opens his mouth, the bullets he launches plunge the atmosphere around him to freezing temperatures.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Snow Peas shoot frozen peas that damage and slow the enemy.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Cryo System:</color>
<color=red>Each bullet will add 10 Cryo Points.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Peashooter + Ice-shroom</color></size>

plants.name: Icicle-shroom
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>The Icicle-shrooms didn't set out to master refrigeration technology. During a hiking trip, they forgot their quilts and spent an entire night frozen atop a mountain, frost forming on their heads. Later, Snow Pea, captivated by their frosty appearance, gifted them some ice bullets to complement their new look.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Icicle-shroom fires icicles that slow down enemies.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Cryo System: </color><color=red>Adds 5 Cryo Points for every icicle hit. Pierce 3 times. Each icicle will deal 4 times more damage to a frozen zombie.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Puff-shroom + Snow Pea (In Order)</color></size>

plants.name: Mini Ice-shroom
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"Smaller in size, same big abilities!" Mini Ice-shroom's signature poker face never cracks as he delivers his jokes, and that might just be why zombies freeze on the spot.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Mini Ice-shroom can temporarily freeze zombies they come into contact with.

<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Freezes zombies that eat it in place.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color>
<color=red>Puff-shroom + Ice-shroom (In Order)</color></size>

plants.name: Ice Fume-shroom
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Ice Fume-shroom stands out among the Fume-shrooms. His study abroad in the freezing Alaskan wilderness made him even cooler—literally. Though he only studied hair design for a few years, he's pretty proud of it.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Ice Fume-shroom's fumes can pass through and freeze zombies.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20/1.5 Seconds (Piercing) </color>
<color=#3D1400>Cryo System: </color><color=red> Will add 5 Cryo Points after each attack.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Fume-shroom + Ice-shroom</color></size>

plants.name: <size=30>Ice Scaredy-shroom
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Ice Scaredy-shroom believes he stands apart from other scaredy-shrooms. Unlike them, he never shrinks in fear and joins in all activities without hesitation. However, that's only because when he gets scared, the air around him plummets in temperature, leaving everyone too afraid to startle him.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Ice Scaredy-shroom can fire ice spores that slow down zombies and freeze nearby zombies when scared.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Cryo System: </color><color=red>10 Cryo Points per attack.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color>
<color=red>Freeze nearby zombies when they get near.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Scaredy-shroom + Ice-shroom</color></size>

plants.name: Es Kacang
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Frost-nut raised its icy spikes high, ready to confront the zombies. Others remarked on how "cold" and "silent" he seemed. Yet, his expression remained unchanged, resolute in his defense against the undead. The truth was his face had simply frozen in place.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Frost-nut are heavy barrier plants. They slow down zombies that bite them.

<color=#3D1400>Toughness: </color><color=red>8000</color>
<color=#3D1400>Cryo System: </color><color=red>Zombies that bite it are slowed down and accumulate 10 Cryo Points.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Ice-shroom + Tall-nut</color></size>

plants.name: Cryodoom-shroom
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"I will freeze the world, and silence will reign. The extreme cold will disrupt your body's temperature system, so it won't be very painful," Cryodoom-shroom proclaims. He seldom appears in battle, but when he does, a blizzard follows in his wake. With a flash of white light, even time seems to freeze.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Cryodoom-shroom can destroy zombies in the entire screen and freeze time.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>1800 (Ashes)</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red> Freezes the level – no new zombies will appear within 10 seconds.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Ice-shroom + Doom-shroom</color></size>

plants.name: Ice Hypno-shroom
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Frost Beauty? High Mountain Flower? Ice Hypno-shroom. She didn't care. She quietly took care of the frost headdress on her head and was ready to hand her high nut headgear to the zombies at any time. "They will like the cool style."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>When a zombie eats an Ice Hypno-shroom, it will transform into an Ice Tall-nut Zombie that will fight for you.

<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Upon contact turns a zombie into an Ice Tall-nut Zombie that will fight for you. Also freezes the full field.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Hypno-shroom + Ice-shroom</color></size>

plants.name: <size=28>Doom Scaredy-shroom
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>While some plants instinctively bury their heads when nervous, Doom Scaredy-shroom thrives on excitement. His adrenaline spikes, causing his bullets to fire at an increasing rate. It's wise to avoid provoking him again, or he might explode from all that pent-up energy.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Doom Scaredy-shroom's attack speed increases as it attacks.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20 / 1.5 Seconds (0.5 Seconds Peak)</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Each attack will shorten the attack interval by 0.1 seconds, max 0.5 seconds.
Resets when zombies get near.
Will explode when zombies get near while peak attack speed is reached.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color>
<color=red>Scaredy-shroom + Doom-shroom</color></size>

plants.name: <size=32>Doom Fume-shroom</size>
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Doom Fume-shroom, the misanthropic workaholic, can't stand the sight of zombies—too much of a distraction. He's got a small stash of bullets, but they're more than lethal enough. "Don't bother me unless it's urgent. If you want them dead, just shoot them yourself." Still, his sharp efficiency keeps everyone looking up to him.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Doom Fume-shroom can destroy most zombies in front of it.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>1800/60 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Manually click to attack all zombies in a row.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Fume-shroom + Doom-shroom</color></size>

plants.name: Mini Doom-shroom
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Mini Doom-shroom may be small, but his temper is explosive. Disagree with him, and he might blow up—no eye contact needed. It's best to admire him from afar—just don't get too close, or things might get messy.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Mini Doom-shroom will explode when it comes into contact with a zombie.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>1800 (Ashes)</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Will explode when zombies get close.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color>
<color=red>Puff-shroom + Doom-shroom (In Order)</color></size>

plants.name: <size=32>Kanjud Hitam
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>The plants have been wondering why the zombies who have died once cannot be killed. Until the nearest Doom Hypno-shroom discovered the problem. "In fact, I didn't do anything. I just enthusiastically helped the zombies activate the backup hidden energy. Don't the red zombies look very dangerous? I have already warned them."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Zombies that eat the Doom Hypno-shroom will get hypnotized, and explode after death.

<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Zombies that eat the Doom Hypno-shroom will be charmed to fight for you. It will explode upon death, dealing massive damage.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color>
<color=red>Hypno-shroom + Doom-shroom</color></size>

plants.name: Doomberg-shroom
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Frost has wrapped around his body, stripping away the innocence of his youth. His eyes, colder and deadlier than any gun's barrel, now only show disdain for his enemies. He's become the reaper, the end of the line. Anyone caught in his frosty sights would do well to leave one less meal prepared at home.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Doomberg-shroom can fire explosive ice cones.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>30*4/3 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Pierces 3 enemies. Splashes 10 damage within range of enemy contact.
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Fume-shroom + Ice-shroom + Doom-shroom</color></size>

plants.name: Squash-spreader
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"He has three heads, and his base isn't even a leaf! He looks nothing like a regular pea!" Many plants cower at the sight of Squash-spreader's peculiar appearance. Yet, Squash-spreader remains unfazed. He thrives in his vibrant life, battling zombies, reading voraciously, playing chess, and winning every pool skipping contest.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Squash-spreader can fire small bouncing squashes.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>40*3/3 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Every time a squash bullet hits the ground, it inflicts 40 points of damage to nearby zombies.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Squash + Threepeater</color></size>

plants.name: Spicy Kelp
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"Passion is like fire," and Spicy Kelp knows this saying all too well. No amount of water can quench their fervent flames! Too bad, the nearby zombies can only feel the heat of the "grilling". Look at them, they have already turned to ashes in this relentless fire!</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Spicy Kelp will burn the entire row of zombies upon contact.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red> Instant Kill + 1800 (Ashes)</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color>
<color=red>Tangle Kelp + Jalapeno (In Order)</color></size>

plants.name: Squash Kelp
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Squash Kelp stands out as a true philosopher among plants. It often mumbles, "Am I the squash or am I the kelp?" or ponders profound questions like, "Where does the grass come from, and where does it go?" However, its disregard for personal hygiene and unkempt hair make other plants shy away, preferring to keep their distance.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Squash Kelp can drag three zombies into the water.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red> Instant Kill*3</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Squash + Tangle Kelp</color></size>

plants.name: Kelp-spreader
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Kelp-spreader basked in the sun, his eyes scanning the horizon. "Many plants are scared of my gaze," he chuckled. "But they'd understand if they had to wear three pairs of sunglasses for protection like I do!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Can fire kelp bullets that slow down zombies.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20*3/1.5 Slows + Stackable with Freeze</color>
<color=#3D1400>Tangle Debuff: </color><color=red>Each bullet will cause additional percentage damage based on the zombie's Tangle Value. The zombie will be insta-killed when the Tangle Value is full.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Threepeater + Tangle Kelp</color></size>

plants.name: Pyrewood
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"It's sweltering out here!" Pyrewood fumed. Convinced that the intense weather was to blame for its skin, it noted how the flames on its head had also turned a vibrant red. Maybe it was the perfect time to kick off a summer adventure called the "Sledding Tour."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Pyrewood can provide an even stronger damage boost to bullets!

<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Improve damage depending on the type of bullet. Explodes upon death.
Peas: 80 | Cherries: 120 | Iron Peas: 320 | Sunlight: 400 | Threeway Pea: 60
Deals 40 damage-over-time to splashed zombies every 3 seconds.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Torchwood + Jalapeno + Jalapeno</color></size>

plants.name: Scorchwood
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>High temperatures and spiciness always go hand in hand. Scorchwood may not grasp this concept, but his years of working at the barbecue stall have certainly infused him with a distinctive heat.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Bullets ignited by the Scorchwood has greatly increased power.

<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Improve damage depending on the type of bullet. Explodes upon death.
Peas: 60, Cherries: 120, Bucks: 320, Sunlight: 400, Threeway Pea: 45</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Jalapeno + Torchwood</color></size>

plants.name: Spicy Squash
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"I'm not as impatient as my brother," Spicy Squash stated calmly. "He rushes through everything, but I've learned that true success comes from patience and careful observation. Sometimes, it's best to wait and let the fire simmer."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Spicy Squash can burn a whole row of zombies.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red> 1800 (Single Tile) + 1800 (Lane)</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Squash + Jalapeno</color></size>

plants.name: Torchthree
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"Why is Torchthree so rich?" the plants frequently pondered. "Oh, it's no big deal," he shrugged. Threeway Torchwood then produced three peas from his hair and added, "I used to work as a magician in a circus."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Can turn one pea into three flaming peas.

<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Splits the peas that pass through into 3 small flaming peas that deal 30 splash damage.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Threepeater + Torchwood</color></size>

plants.name: Torch-kelp
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"Fire struggles to exist beneath the water, which means I can't use my flames to light the way," Torch-kelp admitted. "But once above the surface, my flames can shine once again."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Ignite kelp bullets or drag zombies into the water.

<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Ignites peas and kelp bullets. Ignited kelp bullets can add 1 Tangle Value to all zombies in the splash range.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Tangle Kelp + Torchwood</color></size>

plants.name: WHERE IS THIS 2
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>火焰窝瓜总是一个接一个从窝炬里跳出来。"炼瓜炉里太热了，把我身体都要烤化了！"几个金色的火焰窝瓜一起喊道。</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>他只是一个金色的窝瓜。

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>1800</color></size>

plants.name: <size=28>Scorched Threepeater
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"Why does Jalapeno always get all the credit?" Scorched Threepeater exclaimed, smoke escaping from his mouth. "If they only realized that fusing with Jalapeno burns your peas." He turned to Torchwood with a serious look. "Trust me, you wouldn't want to munch on charred peas!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>A Threepeater who can't fuse because he's scorched.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20*3/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Produces a line of flames that deal 1800 (Ashes) damage in three lanes when planted or fused.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Threepeater + Jalapeno</color></size>

plants.name: <size=28>Squashed Torchwood
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"It's way too hot! Too hot!" Squash yelled, trapped in the flames of Torchwood. "Who put me here? I should be squashing zombies, not being the punchline at a barbecue party!" The heat was overwhelming, and as he reached his breaking point, he ignited, bursting forth from the torch to rejoin the battle against the zombies.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Produces a Squash in front for each 60 peas that pass through it.

<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Every time 60 peas are lit, a Squash will be planted in front.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Squash + Torchwood</color></size>

plants.name: Spikerock
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Spikerock just got back from a trip to Europe. He had a great time, met some wonderful people, really broadened his horizons. He never knew they made museums so big, or put so many paintings in them. That was a big surprise for him.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Spikerocks pop multiple tires and hurt any zombies that step on them.

<color=#3D1400>Toughness: </color><color=red>450</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Can puncture tires, but deducts 50 Toughness.</color></size>

plants.name: Torchweed
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"I'm Torchweed, the zombies' passionate barbecue chef! Ignite that little pea, and I'll throw them an unforgettable barbecue party. Rest assured, I'm a professional—I guarantee it will be crispy on the outside and tender on the inside!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Torchweed can ignite small peas and puncture vehicles.

<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Ignite small peas for increased, and splashed, damage.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Spikeweed + Torchwood</color></size>

plants.name: Scorchweed
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"Studies reveal that spiciness is actually a type of pain," Scorchweed announced, rattling the red thorns on his head. "I intend to let the unbelieving zombies experience this reality for themselves."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Scorchweed pops tires and enflames zombies that step on them.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20</color>
<color=#3D1400>Enflamed Debuff: </color><color=red> Any damage received will increase by 50%.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Jalapeno + Spikeweed</color></size>

plants.name: Squashweed
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"Huh? Yeah." This catchphrase belongs to Squashweed, who rarely speaks and often leaves others feeling uncertain. After dinner, the topic of thorns always becomes a favorite among the plants. It's said that on an ordinary afternoon, as Squash prepared to crush a nearby zombie, he overlooked the thorns lurking beneath its feet.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Zombies will be knocked back every time it attacks.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Each attack will knock back zombies and fire 1 bouncing squash bullet.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Squash + Spikeweed</color></size>

plants.name: Weed-spreader
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"It was nothing but dandruff that I threw out," Spikeweed declared casually. Weed-spreader raised an eyebrow, unconvinced. "Jealous talk, if you ask me," he replied. "You can't fool me with that excuse."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Fires 3 weeds that deal enhanced damage to vehicles.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>5*3/1.5 Seconds (Piercing)</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Bullets deal 30% max Toughness damage to vehicles.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Threepeater + Spikeweed</color></size>

plants.name: <size=34>Gatling Pea-shroom
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"We're off to join the army!" the three little mushrooms shouted with joy. Although their heights didn't meet the requirements and locating small helmets was a struggle, these challenges couldn't hold back the Gatling Pea-shrooms. United as one, they set their sights on becoming the top trio in the army.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Can be stacked three times to shoot 12 small peas at once!

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20*4/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Puff-shroom + Gatling Pea (In Order)</color></size>

plants.name: <size=32>Squashkelp-spreader
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Squashkelp-shooter possesses a contemplative heart, embracing the realm of philosophy. If you hand him a glass of root beer, be prepared for a discourse on Nietzsche's Thus Spoke Zarathustra or Kant's Critique of Pure Reason. Although his musings may sound profound, there are times when he longs for lighthearted conversations, such as discussing the temperature of the water's depths.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Fires kelp that bounce upon contact and slow down water zombies.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>40*3/3 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Tangle Debuff: </color><color=red>Kelp bounce upon contact, dealing 40 Damage to nearby zombies when they land. Slows down water enemies. Adds 1 Tangle Value upon contact.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Tangle Kelp + Threepeater + Squash</color></size>

plants.name: Anabul
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"Woof!" says Cattail. "Woof woof woof! Does this confuse you? Do you expect me to say 'Meow' like a cat because the word 'cat' is in my name and I also look like a cat? That's not how things work around here. I refuse to be pigeonholed."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Cattails can attack any lane and shoot down balloon zombies.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20*2/1.5 Seconds</color></size>

plants.name: Frost Cattail
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"I'm not just a cat... I'm... I'm a super blue cat!" declared Frost Cattail. "Do you have cat ice?" His love for catnip shines through, and he has an undeniable fascination with all things cool.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Frost Cattail can attack any zombie in the lane and slow them down.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20*2/1.5 Seconds (Piercing) </color>
<color=#3D1400>Cryo System: </color><color=red>Each hit on a zombie adds 5 Cryo Points. Additionally focuses its attacks on the affected zombie.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Ice-shroom + Cattail</color></size>

plants.name: Flame Cattail
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"When I was young, I thought I'd be a regular Cattail," Flame Cattail said, warming her tail with pride. "Turns out, I'm a blazing inferno of awesomeness!" Frost Cattail sighed from the corner, muttering, "Showoff."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Flame Cattail can attack zombies in any lane and deal high damage.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>40*2/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Enflamed Debuff: </color><color=red>Deals twice more damage to Enflamed zombies.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Jalapeno + Cattail</color></size>

plants.name: Pompa hamil
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"I've always enjoyed releasing heavy fumes," says Gloom Shroom. "I know a lot of people aren't cool with that. They say it's rude or that it smells bad. All I can say is, would you rather have your brain eaten by zombies?"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Gloom-shrooms fire heavy fumes in an area around them.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20*4/1.9 Seconds</color></size>

plants.name: <size=32>Embergloom-shroom
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Embergloom-shroom's ability to release hot steam has established him as a celebrated pastry baker. His signature spicy pastries are a favorite among many, cherished for their distinct flavors.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Releases high-damaging ember fumes around it.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>40*4/1.9 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Enflamed Debuff: </color><color=red>Inflicts the Enflamed debuff when attacking zombies.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Jalapeno + Gloom-shroom</color></size>

plants.name: Cryogloom-shroom
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Dreaming of a career as a physicist, the Cryogloom-shroom dedicates his days to unraveling the complexities of the world, avoiding contact with other plants. "Why do I have multiple strings of ice cones sprouting from my head?" he muses, the latest question occupying his thoughts. He's oddly adamant about calling them "strings."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Releases cold fumes around that can freeze zombies.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20*4/1.9 Seconds (Piercing) </color>
<color=#3D1400>Cryo System: </color><color=red>Each attack adds 5 Cryo Points.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Ice-shroom + Gloom-shroom</color></size>

plants.name: Scorch-nut
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Scorch-nut is a huge fan of the Olympics and passionately insists that Torchwood be chosen as the Olympic torch. Cautious warning to the uninformed though: do not try to eat him. You may find yourself burning up from the spicy heat.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Zombies will get enflamed when bitten.

<color=#3D1400>Toughness: </color><color=red>8000</color>
<color=#3D1400>Enflamed Debuff: </color><color=red>Zombies that are Enflamed will be 50% more vulnerable to all attacks.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>When affected by the Jalapeno, heals 1000 Toughness. Zombies that attack it also lose 20 Health per attack.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Jalapeno + Tall-nut</color></size>

plants.name: Spikecicle
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>After his return from Alaska, Spikecicle couldn't contain his excitement. Eager to freeze the zombies solid, he relished the thought of "ice" bursting beneath their feet. He made it a point that everyone use the term "ice." His skin still carried the chill from his Arctic adventure, and his eyes shimmered with the brilliance of unmelting snow.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Can puncture tires and freeze zombies.

<color=#3D1400>Toughness: </color><color=red>450</color>
<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20*2/1 Seconds (Piercing) </color>
<color=#3D1400>Cryo System: </color><color=red>Adds 5 Cryo Points per attack.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Can puncture tires, insta-killing vehicles.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Ice-shroom + Spikerock</color></size>

plants.name: Spikinferno
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Not long ago, Spikinferno traveled to Mexico and was swept away by the vibrant enthusiasm of the locals, quickly falling in love with tacos. Now, he's pouring all his energy into a taco museum alongside Spikecicle, though Spikecicle doesn't seem to share his enthusiasm.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Enflame zombies that step on it and also puncture vehicles.

<color=#3D1400>Toughness: </color><color=red>450</color>
<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>40*2/1 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Enflamed Debuff: </color><color=red>Applies the Enflamed Debuff when attacking zombies.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Jalapeno + Spikerock</color></size>

plants.name: Sea Thorn-shroom
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"People often ask about my appearance, so let me clarify: I'm from the Namib Desert," Sea Thorn-shroom said to anyone who inquired. "If you're familiar with geography, you'll know that a desert can be found right next to the ocean!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Attack flying zombies and airships, growing in size after a while.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20 → 20*4 / 1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Growth Time: </color><color=red>120 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Sea-shroom + Cactus</color></size>

plants.name: Sea Sun-shroom
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"Sadly, I am a mushroom, not a flower, so I can't be called a sea flower or anything similar," Sea Sun-shroom admitted. "At times, this brings me down, but don't let it bother you.
