I may not be a sunflower, yet I can still use different physical and chemical reactions in the water to bring you sunshine!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Produces increasing amounts of Sun as it grows.

<color=#3D1400>Sun Output: </color><color=red>15 → 25 → 50 / 15 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Growth Time: </color><color=red>20 Seconds → 40 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Sea-shroom + Sunflower</color></size>

plants.name: Sea Lamp-shroom
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"I've been a light system at a pirate pool party, worked for an Amazon deep-water salvage company for three months, and even served as night fishing bait while I was sleeping!" Sea Lamp-shroom shared, a mix of anger and pride evident in his voice. "Now, I'm looking for a stable job. Uncle Dave mentioned that the backyard pool needed lighting, but he forgot to mention it was infested with zombies!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Dispels fog and give light, growing in size after a while.

<color=#3D1400>Growth Time: </color><color=red>60 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Lumos System: </color><color=red>Gives 1 Lumos Level in a 3x3 Grid, 5x5 after growth.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Sea-shroom + Plantern</color></size>

plants.name: Lumicactus
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"My adventures in the desert have made me remarkably brilliant," Lumicactus boasted, but he never forgot to replenish his lamp oil each day to ensure he continued to shine.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Fires piercing spikes and lasers, depending on the Lumos level.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20/1.5 Seconds, 20*2/1.5 Seconds (Air)</color>
<color=#3D1400>Lumos System: </color><color=red>Gets the following buffs depending on the Lumos Level:
Level 1 = Pierce 3 Times
Level 2 = Infinite Pierce
Level 3 = Laser Air Damage → 60</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Plantern + Cactus</color></size>

plants.name: Glowver
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"The silver candle illuminates the cold autumn canvas, while the light silk fan dances gracefully with the fireflies." This is Glowver's beloved poem. His fascination with fireflies began in childhood, and he often enjoys the cool breeze by the water at night, admiring how their fluorescence rises gently from the wind, twinkling before softly falling back into the dark grass. Only zombies would overlook such exquisite beauty.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Dispels fog and increases the Lumos level of Lumos plants present.

<color=#3D1400>Lumos System: </color><color=red>Gives 1 Lumos Level for Lumos plants in the entire field for 30 seconds.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Plantern + Blover</color></size>

plants.name: Starglow
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Stars dance on the water as fishing lights prepare to rise into the sky. The waves carry away the moon while the tide brings forth the stars. As a child, Starglow dreamed of picking the stars, often gazing at their shimmer on the water. Meeting Plantern taught her that one need not envy the brilliant stars above; even the faintest light, like fireflies, has its own warmth and beauty.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Shoots stars that can track zombies if there's light.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>40*5/3 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Lumos System: </color><color=red>Gets the following buffs: 
Level 1 = Bullets can now track zombies in the same row as them.
Level 2 = Bullets are fired continuously regardless of whether there are zombies.
Level 3 = Bullets track zombies everywhere.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Plantern + Starfruit</color></size>

plants.name: Thornball
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Thornballs always move in groups, chirping arrogantly and looking down on others. The other plants are curious what such tiny creatures could possibly do, but the Thornballs remain unfazed: "If butterflies can stir up a storm, then of course we're far more powerful."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>It spits out thorns to attack zombies in the sky. Does not occupy any grid.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20*2 / 1.5 seconds (Plant), 20*2 / 1 Second (Wingman)</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Can be planted on top of another plant.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Cactus + Blover</color></size>

plants.name: Sea Star
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"Though my name resembles that of an animal, it's just a stage name," Sea Star explained. "I'm a magician who can expel spores of various shapes." He harbors a deep dislike for diving zombies, worried they'll uncover the truth: he's simply a sea-shroom with a star-shaped water gun perched on his head.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Attacks twice when fully grown.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20*5 → 20*5*2 / 1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Growth Time: </color><color=red>60 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Sea-shroom + Starfruit</color></size>

plants.name: Starblover
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"Gather the stars around me and give them to those wishing upon a shooting star," Starblover proudly declares, believing it to be a noble mission. However, not everyone appreciates it—especially when the star shower comes flying directly at them.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Attracts stars to rotate around itself and launch them out.

<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Attracts nearby star bullets. After 6 seconds, shoots them out as tracking bullets with twice the speed and damage. Attracts up to 20 bullets max.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Blover + Starfruit</color></size>

plants.name: Starthorn
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Starthorn has always been a bit of an oddity. The plants joke, "He's always on the ground but only fights the flying zombies. Why doesn't he go after the ground ones?" Starthorn, ever patient, says nothing, quietly protecting his secret: his poor vision only allows him to see the sky when he lies down.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Can only attack zombies in the sky.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20*5/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Bullets track flying zombies across the board.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Cactus + Starfruit</color></size>

plants.name: Sea Blow-shroom
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Sea Blow-shroom has aspirations as grand as a dragon's. Mastering the ancient art of "Feng Shui" from the East, he is well aware of both lucky and unlucky positions. Understanding that wind and water complement each other, he hopes to keep misfortune at bay, whether soaring in the sky or gliding through the water.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Dispels fog and blows back zombies in the water.

<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Dispels fog and repels water zombies.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Sea-shroom + Blover</color></size>

plants.name: Jack O' Lantern
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Jack O' Lantern insists that he frequently encounters ghosts, but do they truly exist? Who can say for certain? Perhaps he was simply dragged into another round of Halloween festivities by someone eager for a good scare.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>In a small area, dispels fog and increase the Lumos Level for the Lumos plants inside.

<color=#3D1400>Toughness: </color><color=red>4000</color>
<color=#3D1400>Lumos System: </color><color=red>Give 1 Lumos Level in a 3x3 Grid. Restores 150 Toughness per Lumos Level every 15 seconds.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Plantern + Pumpkin</color></size>

plants.name: Thorngourd
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Thorngourd might look like a distant relative of Pumpkin, but its current form comes from a desert adventure with Blover. Strangely enough, it doesn't seem to have visible thorns, yet plants that try to hop into it always get poked, leaving them questioning how it happens.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Counterattacks the zombies that bite it.

<color=#3D1400>Toughness: </color><color=red>4000</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Damage attacking enemies.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Cactus + Pumpki</color></size>

plants.name: Stargourd
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>People often wonder how many languages Stargourd must know to communicate effortlessly with all the plants. Stargourd smiles and says, "Actually, I only speak Starfruit's language, since he's the only one I work closely with."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Helps Starblover retain more stars.

<color=#3D1400>Toughness: </color><color=red>4000</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Increases the storage limit of Starblover to 60.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Starfruit + Pumpkin</color></size>

plants.name: Kipli Tiga
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>The Split Pea brothers always argued over the best direction to fire—forward or backward. But now they've found a clever solution: just let the bullets rebound. Problem solved!</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Split Peas shoot peas forward and backwards.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20*3/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Peas shot backwards will bounce and move forwards.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Repeater + Peashooter</color></size>

plants.name: Windgourd
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>For Windgourd, looking good is a top priority. He never leaves home without first spending a solid half hour perfecting the leaves on his head, ensuring his style is flawless.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Every so often a Blover will spawn to blow away the fog.

<color=#3D1400>Toughness: </color><color=red>4000</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Produces a Blover every 30 seconds.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Blover + Pumpkin</color></size>

plants.name: Pumpkin Lure
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Dining out sends shivers down Pumpkin Lure's spine. He's always fearful that the iron cutlery will magically stick to his face, turning an enjoyable meal into an awkward experience.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Can fuse with iron materials from zombies to absorb their properties.

<color=#3D1400>Toughness: </color><color=red>4000</color>
<color=#3D1400>Magnet System: </color><color=red>This plant will deal:
(20 * Amount of Magnetic Plants in System * Zombie Speed) to specific zombies every 6 Seconds. Only Zombies with magnetable materials OR mechanical vehicles can be damaged this way. Also, they must not be on the sky or underground.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Pumpkin + Magnet-shroom</color></size>

plants.name: Starpole
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Starpole harbors a lifelong dream: to suck the stars from the sky. He spends every night staring at the starry heavens, imagining the day when his dream becomes reality.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Can fuse with iron materials from zombies to absorb their properties.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20*5/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Deals double damage to iron zombies.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Starfruit + Magnet-shroom</color></size>

plants.name: Starjoker
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Starjoker often bore the burden of being seen as a circus clown, which left him feeling discontented. "I may appear comical, but I am, in fact, a superhero," he declared. "I commandeered the zombie's Jack-in-the-Box and put on the hero suit inside!" Perhaps the Magnet-shroom who aided him in the heist never mentioned where the box came from.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Shoots out star bullets that explode on contact.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>40*5/3 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Bullets explode to deal a small splash damage upon contact.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>(Starfruit + Magnet-shroom) + Jack-in-the-Box (In Order)</color></size>

plants.name: Starpick
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"It's remarkably pickaxe-like," Starpick commented, a hint of amusement in his tone. "I can feel part of myself nestled in the ground, and it's quite pleasant—unless you're bothered by insects like centipedes." With a cheeky smile, he challenged, "Why not take off my hat? You'll find I'm even more pickaxe-like than you!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Pickfruit hides underground: zombies will not attack it.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20*5/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Cannot be attacked.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>(Starfruit + Magnet-shroom) + Pickaxe</color></size>

plants.name: Starsteel
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>People often use the headshots of Starsteel and Starpole to hype up their relationship, which greatly troubles both of them. In fact, Starsteel just wants to be himself - a star with a heart of stone that is hard to rust.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Fires star bullets lined with a metallic coating.

<color=#3D1400>Toughness: </color><color=red>2000</color>
<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>40*5/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Knocks back on contact. Deals immense damage to Iron Zombies, and break iron doors.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>(Starfruit + Magnet-shroom) + Iron (In Order)</color></size>

plants.name: Iron Pumpkin
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"I wish I were stronger," Iron Pumpkin muses. "Maybe if I were made of diamond..." Steelfruit smirks and replies, "Even that wouldn't be enough! You'd need to be netherite!" In their spirited banter, they forget a vital truth: they can enchant their own strengths.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Protects your plants with sturdy iron.

<color=#3D1400>Toughness: </color><color=red>8000</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>(Pumpkin + Magnet-shroom) + Iron</color></size>

plants.name: Joker Pumpkin
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"Whenever I emerge, it signals the arrival of the clown. Everyone wonders what lies within his box, but the outcome remains a mystery. I caught a glimpse once, and that moment changed everything for me."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Can block explosions caused by Jack-in-the-Box zombies

<color=#3D1400>Toughness: </color><color=red>4000</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Nullifies the explosion damage of the Jack-in-the-Box, protecting the plant inside.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>(Pumpkin + Magnet-shroom) + Jack-in-the-Box</color></size>

plants.name: Miner Pumpkin
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Pumpkin is frequently used to protect the plants in the back from being attacked by miners. Curious about stopping the miners from drilling into the ground, he picked up their pickaxes and studied them. Ultimately, he developed new technology that forces miners to dig their way out of the ground in advance.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Can block mining attempts by Miner Zombies.

<color=#3D1400>Toughness: </color><color=red>4000</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Forces Miner Zombies to unearth prematurely.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>(Pumpkin + Magnet-shroom) + Pickaxe</color></size>

plants.name: Magled-shroom
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"Honestly, I wish I could be a simple Magnet-shroom," Magled-shroom confessed. "That way, I wouldn't have to be in the spotlight constantly or feel the pressure of using one magnet to do the work of two."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Attraction range and cooldown time improves depending on the Lumos Level.

<color=#3D1400>Magnet Interval: </color><color=red>15 Seconds (LL0) → 11 Seconds → 7.5 Seconds → 5 Seconds (LL3)</color>
<color=#3D1400>Magnet Range: </color><color=red>+1 (LL1) → +2 → +3</color>
<color=#3D1400>Lumos System: </color><color=red>Higher Lumos Levels will significantly shorten the attraction interval and increase the attraction range. When it's Lumos Level 2, the attraction will cause 200 damage to zombies near the attraction target.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Plantern + Magnet-shroom</color></size>

plants.name: Sea Mag-shroom
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>The other sea-shrooms couldn't comprehend why Sea Mag-shroom could absorb iron to become bigger and taller. "It's simple: E=mc²," he explained, even if most of the energy was lost in the air and went completely unused.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>That's weird... Why does the iron tool get bigger as well as he grows?

<color=#3D1400>Magnet Interval: </color><color=red>15 Seconds → 10 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Grows after attracting 3 times.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Sea-shroom + Magnet-shroom</color></size>

plants.name: Magblover
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>The plants often call Magblover "Magneto." He confidently casts his favorite spell, "Disarmament!" at the zombies, even though he has no idea how the conversion of wind energy to magnetic energy works behind the scenes.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Suck away all the iron objects present.

<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Attract up to 10 iron objects.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Blover + Magnet-shroom</color></size>

plants.name: Magcactus
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Magcactus spent some time studying communications jamming at the Air Force Academy, often bragging to his friends about his stellar grades. What he doesn't realize is that his success was mostly thanks to his father, a high-ranking Air Force commander pulling strings behind the scenes.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Can cause high damage to flying objects.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Deals double the damage to metallic armor. Dealing a certain amount of damage to Airships can cause it to crash, making it deal 1000 damage to zombies near the crash site.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Cactus + Magnet-shroom</color></size>

plants.name: Starlure
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400></color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Summons a meteor that deal devastating damage to zombies.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>60*5/3 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Lumos System: </color><color=red>Lumos levels 1 to 3 has the same effect as Starglow. Upon hitting Lumos Level 4, summons another type of meteor that has a separate cooldown from the original meteor.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Magnetic System: </color><color=red>Each plant connected to the Magnetic System will increase the damage of the bullets by 5%.
<color=purple>Both systems can increase the damage of the bullets by upto 120, maximum.
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Summons a meteor that hit the ground and explode into stars every 60 seconds. The cooldown can be reduced by connecting other Starlures together, upto 13 for an improved cooldown of 25 seconds.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula:
</color><color=red>Plantern + Magnet-shroom + Starfruit</color></size>

plants.name: Kipli dua Es
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"Whatever happened to you?" a curious plant asked Snow Repeater. He chuckled softly and said, "I'm still a Repeater at heart. I just forgot to snuggle under a blanket during winter nights."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Shoots two frozen peas in succession.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20*2/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Repeater + Ice-shroom</color></size>

plants.name: Kipli Tentara Es
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"His hands are cold, his face is cold, his heart is cold, and even his blood is cold… Is he frozen?" someone wondered aloud. Gatling Snow shivered, reassuring the concerned plants, "I'm not frozen! The barrel of my machine gun is still burning hot!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Gatling Snow shoot four frozen peas at a time.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20*4/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Gatling Pea + Ice-shroom</color></size>

plants.name: Kipli Tiga Es
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>"Don't let his icy facade mislead you; there could be a hidden warmth," someone suggested. But Miner Zombie sneered, "Don't make foolish assumptions. This guy has nothing but cold sides!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Shoots frozen peas forwards and backwards.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>20*3/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Split Pea + Ice-shroom</color></size>

plants.name: Kipli 3 Rasa Ceri
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Cherryshooter crawled out of the trench, bewildered. "Who threw that bomb?" he demanded. "Sorry, brother," Split Cherry replied sheepishly, "I saw you pointing your gun at us and thought you were a zombie."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Split Cherry shoot cherries forward and backwards.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>60*3/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Split Pea + Cherry Bomb</color></size>

plants.name: Kipli Sniper
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Admired for his sharp vision and robust strength, Sniper Pea is cherished by his Pea comrades. However, during their formation marches, his gun barrel often finds its way into the backs of their heads, making for some tense moments along the way.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Snipes zombies all over the map to deal massive damage.

<color=#3D1400>Damage: </color><color=red>500/3 Seconds</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Headshot once every 6 attacks, insta-killing zombies.</color></size>
plants.cost: <size=24><color=purple>Usage Condition: Large Map Tower Defense Modes</color></size>

plants.name: <size=30>Bloverthorn Pumpkin
plants.introduce: <size=24><color=#3D1400>Bloverthorn Pumpkin always kept three books on its shelf, their titles concealed from the curious eyes of the other plants. One day, a Thornball's curiosity led it into the study, where it uncovered the titles: "Guide to Succulent Plant Cultivation," "Postpartum Care for Pumpkins," and "30-Second Cactus Quick Flight Tutorial." The Thornball chuckled at the unexpected collection.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=24>Spawns a Thornball that moves around the field to attack flying zombies.

<color=#3D1400>Toughness: </color><color=red>4000</color>
<color=#3D1400>Special: </color><color=red>Always has a Thornball wingman with him when he appears. Generates a Thornball on top of a 3x3 grid regularly.</color>
<color=#3D1400>Fusion Formula: </color><color=red>Pumpkin + Cactus + Blover</color></size>
